task.title: Step1. Plan and Assign Extensions
task.shortdesc: Before you start to connect the Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBXs, you need to plan and assign extensions for the headquarter and the branch offices.

taskbody.context:
In our example, we assign extensions as bellow:
Headquarter PBX: 1XXX (extension number starts with 1)
BranchA PBX: 2XXX (extension number starts with 2)
BranchB PBX: 3XXX (extension number starts with 3)
Plan and assign the extensions on the headquarter PBX and the branch PBXs.

step.cmd: Log in the PBX web interface, go to Settings PBX General Preferences .
Change the User Extensions to the desired range.
Go to Settings PBX Extensions , create extensions.
